snippet.title: Teaser radio edition! (English version)
snippet.description:
Join us over the airwaves to discover an unusual event in Spain, which occurred in August of 98, in the village of Solana de Calatrava.

The Transference is a Survival Horror, wrapped in a story full of family secrets and betrayals, located in northern Andalusia (Spain) in the late 90s.

❤ Add to your Steam Wishlist now! https://s.team/a/2645200/
